org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.exist
Interface IAeExistDataSource

All Superinterfaces:
IAeXMLDBDataSource
All Known Implementing Classes:
AeExistDataSource
public interface IAeExistDataSource
extends IAeXMLDBDataSource

An interface that defines the set of methods needed to give access to the Exist database.

Field Summary

          A key into the config map (the Exist collection to use).
